title: Health Information Chatbot
description: This is an ongoing project to build a chatbot that can answer health-related questions with a knowledge graph component.

title: Malaria Modelling
description: Performed timeseries modelling of malaria with a number of variables, incorporating temperature and mosquito mortality through regression analysis.

title: Stroke Prediction
description: Contrasted the performance of various machine learning models in predicting stroke risk based on patient data. Used Precision, Recall, Accuracy , F1 Score and ROC-AUC as evaluation metrics.
